name: Hotel Wanderer (Cheeel)
description:
Hotel Wanderer is a roguelike game based on "The Binding Of Isaac".

You play the character of Jane, a lost girl trying to find her teddybear "Tibbers".

You're lost in this Junky Hotel where Drugs & Alcohol are everywhere.

To escape, you'll have to find your teddybear. To help you throughout your adventure, the hotel's waiter will offer you some cakes, candies and juice in exchange for cufflinks. Those will rise Jane's caracteristics!

But be careful, Grosu the old man will chase you if he sees you!

There are a few bugs such as the npc's chat box appearing at the begining of the game, Grosu's health bar appearing randomly or some visual issues that will be fixed in the future!
